name: restart-an-app
title: Restart Running Apps
description: View and instantly restart any running application on your Mac.
author: BinaryBlitz10

commands.name: restart-an-app
commands.title: Restart Running Apps
commands.description: Select and restart any running app on your Mac

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
